author: Yun Li
title: JPMorgan's Kolanovic, who called market turn, says investors should bet on sunshine killing virus
description: "The most striking finding in the document is that sunlight destroys the virus very quickly, within ~2 minutes," the strategist said.
content:
(This story is for CNBC Pro subscribers only.)
Investors can count on the warmer weather to curb the coronavirus pandemic, and the market will reclaim its record highs by early next year, according to a top JPMorgan strategist whose calls are widely followed.
